scripts.deploy:
> graphcool.yml && echo "## THIS FILE IS AUTOGENERATED
## SEE package.json/scripts.deploy
" >> graphcool.yml && yarn permissions && yarn types && yarn functions && graphcool deploy
scripts.concat:yml:
> ./$COLLECTION.compiled.yml && find ./$COLLECTION/ -name '*.yml' -type f -exec cat {} \; > ./$COLLECTION.compiled.yml && echo "$COLLECTION:" >> graphcool.yml && cat ./$COLLECTION.compiled.yml >> graphcool.yml && echo "
" >> graphcool.yml
